title: Restaurant with Function space available for League events in the Parramatta (NSW) area
body:
Hi All - I am a LoL/Riot fan and I happen to own a restaurant (in Parramatta, NSW) with a function area. I would love to host some League events if anyone's looking for venues! Just PM me in-game or reply to this thread :)

We're [Skinnys Grill Parramatta](http://www.skinnysgrill.com.au) - we do low-carb casual dining and and we're fully licensed. The upstairs space has a projector and sound system and can seat 50 for a viewing or 20 for a LAN (have done a few before).

replies.body: damn, that is dope my man!
